This R Notebook provides an **interactive visualization and analysis** of the survey data from **471 university students in Ethiopia**, using the actual research dataset.  
It explores demographics, career exposure, and satisfaction with guidance services.

You can click the **"Code"** buttons to show or hide the underlying R code for each section.

```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(dplyr)
library(plotly)
library(DT)
library(wordcloud)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(reshape2)
